title: tdid-example
text: Load library Upload data Estimate TDID controls

what: Replicate the graph from the paper
title: tdid-example
text: Single iteration Monte Carlo simulations Plot results
code: single_it = function(n, seed) {   data = example_dgp(n = n, seed = seed)   mod = drtdid(data)   return(mod) } reps = 2000 N = 2000 res = parallel::mclapply(1:reps, single_it, n = N) |> dplyr::bind_rows() res |>    dplyr::mutate(diff_dr = dr_A - dr_B) |>    ggplot() +    geom_density(aes(x = tau, fill = "DR A - WDR B"), alpha = .5) +   geom_density(aes(x = diff_dr, fill = "DR A - DR B"), alpha = .5) +   geom_vline(aes(xintercept = mean(res$dr_A - res$dr_B), color = "DR A - DR B"), linetype = "dashed", size = 1) +   geom_vline(aes(xintercept = mean(res$tau), color = "DR A - WDR B"), linetype = "dashed", size = 1) +   scale_x_continuous(breaks = -3:5, limits = c(-3, 5)) +   guides(color = "none") +    theme(legend.position = "bottom") +    labs(x = "Estimated Difference", y = "Density", fill = NULL) #> Warning: Using `size` aesthetic for lines was deprecated in ggplot2 3.4.0. #> ℹ Please use `linewidth` instead. #> This warning is displayed once every 8 hours. #> Call `lifecycle::last_lifecycle_warnings()` to see where this warning was #> generated. #> Warning: Removed 1 row containing non-finite outside the scale range #> (`stat_density()`). #> Warning: Removed 6 rows containing non-finite outside the scale range #> (`stat_density()`).

what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: R functions calculate triple difference--differences (TDID) controls using double-robust estimators.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: can install development version tdid GitHub :
